title: Drawing, June 26, 1857
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations; again, at lower right: 2- Exquisite blue green ...........[?] / 3- Warmer yellow brown; and again, at lower left: Pichincha June 26th 57 / - Chillo
provenance: Louis P. Church, Hudson, New York
description: Horizontal view of the mountain range with the peak rising in the background over low ranges and a valley filled with foliage covered gulley and ravines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, June 26, 1857.
June 26, 1857. Graphite on buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-246.
